name: commuter-client
description: commuting notebooks across S3 to multi-users via dashboard

scripts.bootstrap: npm install && npm run lerna && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:components && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: lerna exec --scope commuter-client -- npm run build
scripts.build:components: lerna exec --ignore commuter-client -- npm run build
scripts.start: lerna exec --scope commuter-cli -- npm run start
scripts.server: lerna exec --scope commuter-cli -- npm run server
scripts.client: lerna exec --scope commuter-cli -- npm run client
scripts.clean: npm run clean:install && npm run clean:build

author: nteract contributors
